channel.title: HOw to complete pantless
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "HOw to complete pantless"

item.title: Re: HOw to complete pantless
item.content:encoded:
Don't bother teaming Emo and Billy for the extra +1 Strength and +1 Range.

Throw in Anonymous/Right level 2 if you've got 'em, or another Range Boosting ally.
You're gonna need that, and Emo/Billy give +8 Strength without the teamup anyway. More than enough.

item.title: Re: HOw to complete pantless
item.content:encoded: Billy3+Emo3 team is +4 range +9 strength. Use them plus Imperishable Night(if redeye) or Striking Snake Technique to give yourself the most chances for success.

item.title: Re: HOw to complete pantless
item.content:encoded: yeah i know but i was wondering wat the best combo would b as im not to sure how to hit that target

item.title: Re: HOw to complete pantless
item.content:encoded: You can use normal allies on Pants/Pantsless mission afaik.

item.title: HOw to complete pantless
item.content:encoded:
well my base range is 18 without allies and i have almost every ally

but how do i assure i hit the 20 tai/gen diffuculty with 20 successes

wat jutsu do i use?? wat allies ??
i was thinking vanilla, smiley for the +4 range but il doubt even with 22 range i can get 20 succesees so can anyone give me input
please
